entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 6:39 PM CST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 6:39 PM CST Saturday 31 December 2022
